title: New: Tsar B – Tsar B EP
body:
Having exploded onto the pop scene at the tail end of last year with the otherworldly _Escalate_, Belgium’s **Tsar B** has established a blossoming reputation for her intoxicating live shows, with a recent outing at Pukkelpop cementing her name as one of the most exciting new talents around.

Her self-titled debut EP is a culmination of the past years work, and showcases her expansive, audacious sound, with the swirling, addictive _Swim_ forming a vibrant centre piece for the release to twist and contort around. Whilst maintaining enough of a pop edge to it in order to open it up to larger audiences, the releases manages to remain exhilaratingly experimental. Check out a couple of tracks below and hear the full release [here](https://open.spotify.com/album/5Q1fdpFrZVUDqLwHI2CafA).

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
